duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurate and timely processing of Medicare enrollment transactions
Assist in managing high-priority enrollment issues and escalations
Collaborate with team members on special projects
Develop knowledge of CMS Manual, Chapter 2, Enrollment and Disenrollment
Review enrollment audit findings and implement process improvement initiatives
Assist in training and guiding the teams through changes in processes and operating instruction

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required with 5+ years of relevant professional Medicare Advantage Enrollment operations for an insurance company or healthcare payor (Master's preferred)
